body:
a small new feature, a few code corrections and some dependencies updated

In particular:
 * Now the last four drinks (instead of just one) are available as a shortcut in your launcher (if supported)
 * Small fixes related to multithreading
 * Update Retrofit

notes:
 * The file ending in `gp` is the one you can download from Google Play.
 * The file ending in `gpo` is the one I uploaded to Google Play.
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.* (But it's not yet ready.)

a few bugs fixed and some dependencies updated

In particular:
 * Update SDK, build tools and target SDK version to Android 10 (d80027ea6af80942c404038100b43fa98fa88a20)
 * Update Retrofit (840e703d2b503d159f7867ce042886aa7a411079)
 * MeteroidAdapter: Fix getPositionForSection to not throw an exception (60cbc0c060cf0ea18ccdb917a5d0eaf5d956accc)

notes:
 * The file ending in `gp` is the one you can download from Google Play.
 * The file ending in `gpo` is the one I uploaded to Google Play.
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

new in this release:
 * shortcuts and intents for buying stuff
 * about screen
 * reworked transitions between activities
 * bug fixes

notes:
 * The file ending in `gp` is the one you can download from Google Play.
 * The file ending in `gpo` is the one I uploaded to Google Play.
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

new in this version:
 * less lint warnings
 * more buttons

new in this version:
 * new buttons
 * new images

new in this version:
 * less duplicate code
 * better error messages

new in this version:
 * added grid view
 * added German translation
 * display which drink was bought
 * display stubs instead of user images
 * reworked drinks and money

new in this release:
 * less code duplication
 * new logo

new in this version:
 * add image cache
 * handle network errors better

name: v1.9
body:
This is the last v1 version.

new in this version:
 * integrate a bit better with the Mete API
 * support Android 6

name: v2.0
body:
This is the first v2 version, yay.

new in this version:
 * use Material design on Android 5 and newer
 * don't access the external storage
 * support creating users without specifying a balance
 * use okHttp

name: v2.0.1
body:
This is the first version to appear in F-Droid. Nothing significant changed in comparison to v2.0.

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.1.0
body:
new in this version:
 * use ActionBars
 * support editing users
 * added progress indicators
 * reworked network stuff

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.2.0
body:
new in this version:
 * better handling of input errors
 * fix XML lint warnings
 * use Android's own icons for things if possible
 * display some screens (`SetHostname` and `UserSettings`) as dialogs on big screens

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.3.0
body:
new in this version:
 * use Retrofit
 * rework network stuff
 * add coins
 * add support for deleting users

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.3.1
body:
new in this version:
 * support users and drinks being inactive (note: If you have an old version of Mete, all users and drinks will be displayed as inactive. This shouldn't impact usability.)

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.3.2
body:
new in this version:
 * support buying drinks by scanning a barcode
 * corrected the size of avatars
 * display negative account balances in red

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.3.3
body:
new in this version:
 * floating action buttons
 * fix for Android 2.3 on small screens

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.4.0
body:
new in this version:
 * reworked connection part
 * reworked config part
 * support multiple API versions (currently just `legacy` and `v1`)
 * support config versions and upgrades
 * use data-binding
 * better compatibility to the Space-Market API v1 spec
 * better support for Android 2.3
 * add swipe-to-refresh
 * made refresh more seamless
 * upgraded dependencies
 * small bugfixes

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.4.1
body:
new in this version:
 * upgraded dependencies
 * use the sort order provided by the server
 * small bugfixes

notes:
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

name: v2.4.2
body:
new in this version:
 * upgraded dependencies
 * small bugfixes

notes:
 * This is the first version of v2 that got published to Google Play.
 * The file ending in `gp` is the one you can download from Google Play.
 * The file ending in `gpo` is the one I uploaded to Google Play.
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*

new in this release:
 * fast scroll for drinks and users
 * warning when using HTTP
 * improved support for Android 9
 * reworked loading of images
 * small bugfixes

notes:
 * The file ending in `gp` is the one you can download from Google Play.
 * The file ending in `gpo` is the one I uploaded to Google Play.
 * The file ending in `fd` is the one F-Droid built. *You should install this one.*
This is the original v1 version that was published to Google Play.
